r.s: An alternative to HTML_QuickForm_select using radio buttons and checkboxes
r.d: A QuickForm plugin that extends the select element and turns its options into checkboxes or radio buttons depending on whether the multiple html attribute was set or not. For extra options not listed, you can also render an 'Other' textfield.
r.n: - Fixed Bug #12940: XHTML compliance - Implemented Request #14475: SelectOther as textarea instead of input text - Implemented Request #12941: Allow generation of list markup
